    Pick: Memphis Grizzlies +11.5

They've got the Heat as a massive -11.5 point favorite! That's a ridiculous spread for a team that should only be favored by about five points! Vegas is clearly overvaluing the Heat here and sleeping HARD on the Grizzlies' ability to keep this game within single digits. Take the 11.5 points, my friends. This is pure statistical gold!
